#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<algorithm>
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        int degree[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)degree[i]=0;//={0};
        if(m==0){cout<<"YES"<<endl;continue;}
        int e1,e2;
        int sum_deg=0;
        while(m--)
        {
            cin>>e1>>e2;
            degree[e1-1]++;
            degree[e2-1]++;
            sum_deg+=2;
        }
        int curr=0;
        sort(degree,degree+n);
        bool check=false;
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            curr+=degree[i];
            if((curr-(sum_deg/2))==(((n-i)*(n-i-1))/2))
            {check=true;
             break;}
        }
        if(check==true)cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        }
        }
